physical_appearance: This is an embroidered tunic. It has short sleeves. The base of the garment is dotted red, with silver, gold and purple embroidery. The collar features an embroidered gold and purple scallop design. The hem of the tunic is decorated with an embroidered panel.
sgcool_label_text: This tunic would have been worn over leggings by women of the Khatri community of Kutch, Gujarat, for special occassions. The material is a fine silk bandhni (tie-and-dye) typical of the region, over which embroidery and embellishments in real silver has been undertaken.
subject_terms_1: folk costume embroidery (visual works) tops (garments, general) blouses (main garments) ceremonial costume
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Tunics Embroidery Blouses Khatris
